column3: All Individuals receiving an adverse sanction decision

column1: Source: Decision Making and Appeals System (DMAS), via Stat-Xplore
Cells in this table have been randomly adjusted to avoid the release of confidential data.  Due to adjustments totals may not be the sum of the individual cells.
Tables based on individuals show a count of how many individuals have received a sanction decision.
An individual may receive more than one sanction decision in any given period.
An adverse decision is a decision found against the claimant, i.e. a sanction or disallowance is applied.
Users should not sum the cells in a table to obtain the overall number of individuals as an individual may appear in a
table more than once.  Always use the "Total" within the table to obtain this number.
